title: Eggs Benedict
shortDescription: It's a nice and delicious food.
detailDescription: This simple one-pot chicken uses the whole bird and poaching keeps it succulent. Blast the skin with a blowtorch to make it golden and deliciously crisp. A satisfying chicken and mushroom one-pot that makes a great family supper or freeze leftovers for another day. Cook a chicken breast in an infused liquid for a beautifully tender, lightly seasoned piece of meat that's perfect for adding to salads, soups and sandwiches.
